"Owl"... I wonder what an owl is... Is it a bird? A mammal? 

I look at the books around me, searching for answers. "Strigiformes"... that sounds like a word that's hard to pronounce. What does it mean?

I feel... curious. Why are there 200 species of owls? And they're all animals of prey? That means they hunt other creatures... What kind of creatures do owls hunt? 

I read on...
